alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, northwestern Pulaski, southeastern Twiggs, Bleckley, southeastern Houston and west central Johnson Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Dublin to Goldsboro to near Hawkinsville, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Browndale, Coley Station, Mobley Crossing, Nicklesville, Magnolia, Royal, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Harlow, Paulk, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Rebie and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Houston; Johnson; Laurens; Pulaski; Twiggs; Wilkinson
